feed.title: Obtainium Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.52
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2265:
  • Always follow redirects and store cookies between redirects, including for downloads — useful for https://xeiaso.net/blog/2025/anubis (https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/issues/2264)
  • Even more flexibility in the HTML source — JSON string extraction fallback (https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/issues/2262)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.51...v1.1.52

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.53
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Use built-in method to fix HTML link resolution by @wodin in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2273
  • Convert fastlane images to symbolic links by @UjuiUjuMandan in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2267
  • allow apkpure links for apks with no variant list by @bernikr in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2290
  • Add allowOverride app source option by @wodin in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2285
  • Add support for vivo App Store by @iKirby in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2269
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2292
  • Add missing update ownership permission (#2078)
  • Update colour picker component to pick up layout fix (#2258)
  • Fix a few more title case lines (#2284)
  • Added battery optimization notice to welcome message (#2291)

New Contributors

  • @wodin made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2273
  • @bernikr made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2290
  • @iKirby made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2269

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.52...v1.1.53

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.54
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Updated ca.json by @Cambrells in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2297
  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2295
  • bugfix: invalid version codes for some apkpure links by @bernikr in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2296
  • Attempt to fix RuStore charset bug (#2294) by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2299
  • Add support for building via a docker container [remote dev] by @Fmstrat in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2150
  • Update Kotlin version (to enable Docker builder) + update Dockerfile by @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2300

New Contributors

  • @Fmstrat made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2150

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.53...v1.1.54

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.55
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Create ar.json by @Hussain96o in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2303
  • Rewrite APKPure Source to use the mobile API instead of web scraping by @bernikr in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2305

New Contributors

  • @Hussain96o made their first contribution in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2303

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.54...v1.1.55

entry.title: New release for Obtainium: v1.1.56
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update hu.json by @summoner001 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2308
  • By @ImranR98 in https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/pull/2327
  • Better error message for file deletion failures (#2298)
  • Experiment with smarter version detection (#2324)
  • Support Debian-style standard versions (#2314)
  • Minor UI tweak (pseudo-version in italics on apps page instead of readout)
  • Search should not select any sources by default
  • Update Android-side Gradle + upgrade to Java 21 + upgrade Flutter packages where possible

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ImranR98/Obtainium/compare/v1.1.55...v1.1.56
